Detailed Description

A class that contains the initialized objects of the classes in Core. This is a "poor man's" implementation of Inverion of Control. If time, convert this to an appropriate IoC container.

Member Function Documentation

void Core::ShoppedGuiHelper::CommitDrawingToCurrentImage ( Image  image  )  [inline]

Called after a drawing event occurred in the gui. Checks if the image is different from the CurrentImage and adds it to history if it is.

Parameters:
image The current image being displayed in the gui.
